name: Moons of the Aether: Training Demo
name_original: Moons of the Aether: Training Demo
description:
Fight through enemies and collect aether crystals!

Use these crystals to increase your power and shield levels!

Look for better equipment that can channel your aether more effectively!

Your goal is to reach the upgrade your power and shield level to their maximum potential. 

------------------------------------------------------

I plan to add more content to the demo such as:

Different game types!

Humanoid player model!

Music!

New locations!

Improved UI!

------------------------------------------------------

Programs used:

Unity

Blender

Gimp

Audacity
